whatIsQR.title: What is a QR code?
whatIsQR.description1: A QR code (Quick Response) is a two-dimensional barcode that can store information such as URLs, phone numbers, text messages, and more. QR codes are easily scanned with any smartphone camera, making them ideal for sharing information quickly and contactlessly.
whatIsQR.description2: Our tool allows you to generate QR codes for free, without registration and without limits. You can create QR codes for web links, WhatsApp, WiFi, plain text, and more. All codes are generated instantly and can be customized with different sizes, colors, and output formats.
whatIsQR.description3: QR codes use an advanced error correction system that allows the code to be scanned correctly even if partially damaged or covered. This makes them extremely reliable for use in printed materials, advertising, and commercial applications.
whatIsQR.description4: With our generator, you can create professional QR codes in seconds. It supports multiple export formats (PNG, JPG, PDF, SVG) and allows you to add your custom logo to create unique codes that represent your brand.

step1.title: Select QR type
step1.description: Choose between generating a QR code for a URL or for WhatsApp. If you choose WhatsApp, you can add a message that will be sent automatically when scanning the code.

step2.title: Enter information
step2.description: Enter the complete URL (for example: https://example.com) or the WhatsApp number with country code (for example: 1234567890).

step3.title: Generate and download
step3.description: Click "Generate QR" and wait a few seconds. Once generated, you can download the QR code in PNG format to use in your printed or digital materials.

useCases.title: Use cases
useCases.intro: QR codes have a wide variety of practical applications across different industries and contexts. From digital marketing to business operations, QR codes facilitate instant and efficient connections between the physical and digital worlds.

marketing.title: Marketing and Advertising
marketing.description: Share links to your products, promotions, or websites on flyers, posters, and advertising materials. QR codes allow you to track engagement and convert physical visitors into digital customers. Ideal for advertising campaigns, special offers, and promotional landing pages.

social.title: Social Media
social.description: Make it easy for your followers to access your WhatsApp profile or website from your posts. QR codes eliminate the need to type long URLs and reduce friction in the connection process. Perfect for growing your audience and increasing interaction.

business.title: Business Cards
business.description: Add a QR code to your business card so contacts can easily access your information. You can link your LinkedIn profile, website, portfolio, or contact information. This modernizes your networking and facilitates information exchange.

restaurant.title: Restaurant Menus
restaurant.description: Provide quick access to digital menus or online ordering systems using QR codes on tables. This reduces physical contact, allows real-time menu updates, and improves customer experience. Especially useful in the post-pandemic era.

events.title: Events
events.description: Share event information, registration forms, or WhatsApp groups for participants. QR codes on tickets, programs, or event materials facilitate interaction and networking. You can also use them for post-event surveys and feedback collection.

support.title: Customer Support
support.description: Offer a direct communication channel with WhatsApp so customers can easily contact you. QR codes on products, manuals, or support materials allow customers to get instant help without searching for phone numbers or URLs. Significantly improves customer satisfaction.

footer.description: Free tool to generate QR codes quickly and easily. No registration, no limits, no complications. Create customized QR codes for URLs, WhatsApp, WiFi, and text in seconds.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about our QR code generator
faq.question1: Is it free to use the QR code generator?
faq.answer1: Yes, our QR code generator is completely free. It requires no registration and has no limits on the number of codes you can generate.
faq.question2: What types of QR codes can I generate?
faq.answer2: You can generate QR codes for URLs, WhatsApp (with predefined message), WiFi networks (with SSID and password), and plain text. All types are fully customizable.
faq.question3: Can I add my logo to QR codes?
faq.answer3: Yes, you can add your custom logo to the center of the QR code. The logo is automatically resized to maintain code readability.
faq.question4: In what formats can I download QR codes?
faq.answer4: You can download your QR codes in multiple formats: PNG, JPG, PDF, and SVG. Each format is ideal for different uses (printing, web, documents, etc.).
faq.question5: Is my information stored on servers?
faq.answer5: No, all QR codes are generated locally in your browser. Your history is saved only on your device using localStorage. We never send your data to our servers.
faq.question6: Do generated QR codes have a time limit?
faq.answer6: No, generated QR codes do not have an expiration date. They will work indefinitely as long as the content they point to (URL, etc.) remains valid.
faq.question7: Can I customize the color of QR codes?
faq.answer7: Yes, you can choose any color for your QR codes using the color picker or entering a hexadecimal code. This allows you to create codes that match your brand.
faq.question8: What size QR code should I use?
faq.answer8: The recommended size depends on use: 200-300px for web, 500-1000px for printing, and up to 2000px for large format materials. Our generator allows you to adjust the size according to your needs.
faq.question9: Can I view my history of generated QR codes?
faq.answer9: Yes, you can access your complete history from the 'History' button in the menu. There you'll see all the codes you've generated, with the option to download them again.
faq.question10: Does the service work without an Internet connection?
faq.answer10: No, you need an Internet connection to generate QR codes, as processing is done on our servers. However, once generated, the codes work offline.

about.title: About QR Generator
about.intro: QR Generator is a free and open-source web tool designed to create customized QR codes quickly and easily. Our mission is to provide an accessible solution for everyone, without registration barriers, hidden costs, or artificial limitations.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: We believe technology should be accessible to everyone. That's why we offer a completely free QR code generator, with no registration required, that allows users and businesses to create professional QR codes in seconds. Our goal is to simplify the QR code creation process while maintaining quality and customization options.

features.title: Key Features
features.item1: Instant QR code generation without limits
features.item2: Multiple QR types: URLs, WhatsApp, WiFi, and text
features.item3: Full customization: size, color, and format
features.item5: Local history to access your previous codes

openSource.title: Open Source
